comments.body: At some point, we should probably also have a `it should "forbid to SignIn while still connecting to a ledger"` and `it should "forbid to SignIn when permanently failed to connect"`

Some point is https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/pull/3138/commits/588e11b6524b1b6e66d5a6bd82dd5e1729484974 :slightly_smiling_face: 

Very good point, thanks for bringing this up.
